prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a crab with bright blue colors and distinct yellow antennae.
I want a Pokemon with a sleek aquatic body and a playful personality, perfect for underwater adventures.
Generate a small Pokemon with pincers and a vibrant blue shell, showcasing its ability to blend into the ocean.
Make a Pokemon that has an interesting mix of blue and yellow with a unique design inspired by sea creatures.
Imagine a tiny, agile Pokemon that can navigate through water effortlessly, featuring a distinctive crustacean form.
Design a water-themed Pokemon with a charming appearance and a focus on quick movements in aquatic environments.
Show me a Pokemon that captures the essence of the ocean with its bright colors and playful demeanor.
